item.title: Newsletter #1
item.description: ART√çCULOS Y TUTORIALES 2 Interested in cross-platform development with KMM? Are you interested in cross-platform development with Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile? Check out this thread with helpful content from the community. Final Books, Free for Everyone Mark Murphy, aka CommonsWare, has released his full catalog of books available for download. PDFs, EPUBs, and MOBI/Kindle editions are available for all of the books, and many of the newer ones are also available for direct reading on the site.
